title: Islam and impact on gender relations

content.prompt: As Islam spread between 1200 and 1600, it affected gender relations in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Women were no longer allowed to be small-scale traders.
Women became fully equal to men in terms of the right to divorce.
Existing local customs regarding marriage and the role of women blended with Islamic models.

topic.text: 1.3: Developments in South and Southeast Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
